text: يَٰصَٰحِبَيِ ٱلسِّجۡنِ أَمَّآ أَحَدُكُمَا فَيَسۡقِي رَبَّهُۥ خَمۡرٗاۖ وَأَمَّا ٱلۡأٓخَرُ فَيُصۡلَبُ فَتَأۡكُلُ ٱلطَّيۡرُ مِن رَّأۡسِهِۦۚ قُضِيَ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ ٱلَّذِي فِيهِ تَسۡتَفۡتِيَانِ
translation: 41. Casbit yo luk tan yi namma kataysaw: siinik numuk teynah tugactek usuk casbik awqeleeh isi amoyta gocoy afqele, akattuy gaqambo moyyal yakkuqem isik yubleh tugactek fannisimeleeh haada kay moyyak cado akmele, isin warsa kak faxxeeniih esserten caagid meklimeeh gaba kaleh keenik iyye Nabii Yuusuf.
